item.description:
Cost: $25 per person


Hi Everyone -

Feel like playing some golf this weekend? It's supposed to be a nice Saturday ;-D After calling a number of courses, it seems many are holding tournaments this weekend. I was able to find T times at the Ridder Golf Club. The address says W. Bridgewater but it's actually right outside Whitman, not too far from the Rockland Course we have frequented. The course looks like a par 3/4 and our first T time is scheduled for 3:00 pm.

Hope to see you there!!

Note:

Please check your email that afternoon for any cancellation from me.

*SSFMG and its organizers are not responsible for any injuries to participants or damage to equipment.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Saturday Golf Anyone!!!
